Text:
Quote: "I honestly Hate uploading information on These SCUMBAGS hiding in DARK ROOMS making decisions on Man Kind like we are cattle heading off to Slaughter. Actually that is exactly how they look at mankind. We are the "CATTLE" that pay taxes to their System of Domination before they take us of to slaughter. This is exactly what WE DESERVE. Setting on our FAT ASSES watching TV instead of watching our LEADERS take US to market.

Every time I upload some of this Garbage I gotta take a Shower and clean their stench off of me. Next time you drive by a Masonic Hall, think of The Human Sacrifices that they make Daily to their LUCIFER. All the Wars, all the Famine, all the Sickness, All the Heart Ache is their Offering to Their Fake God SATAN.

If the 200 richest families in The World gave just 4% of their Wealth to Humanity, ALL starvation, sickness, homelessness could be eradicated. HOWS THAT FOR pure EVIL!!!!!!!!"

You've been reading my mail, awaken888..
That's just how it feels..

Thanks for your incredible efforts to assemble and upload this material, both this and the opposite side of the war for our souls and bodies.. True thanks.

V.
